short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Organizer - Workspaces: Group tabs, save & restore, boost productivity. Ideal for students, researchers, and professionals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of having too many tabs open in Chrome? Meet Tab Organizer - Workspaces, the ultimate solution for tab management. This powerful Chrome extension allows you to group your tabs into workspaces, making it easy to switch between different sets of tabs for different projects, tasks, or research topics.

With Tab Organizer - Workspaces, you can create a workspace with a name and save all the tabs related to that project or task. When you're ready to resume work on that project, simply open the workspace, and all your saved tabs will be restored in a new window. No more wasting time trying to find the right tab in a cluttered browser window.

Tab Organizer - Workspaces supports both Romanian and English, so you can use it in the language of your choice. It's perfect for anyone who needs to manage multiple tabs and projects simultaneously, from students and researchers to business professionals and freelancers. It's simple, intuitive, and easy to use, making it a must-have tool for anyone who wants to be more productive and organized in their work.

Features:
- Create workspaces with a name
- Save and restore tabs in a workspace
- Switch between workspaces with ease
- Streamline your tab management and boost your productivity
- Compatible with all versions of Chrome
- Compatible with Edge
- Supports both Romanian and English

Take control of your tabs today with Tab Organizer - Workspaces. Add to browser now and start organizing!
